title.narrative: Strengthening Primary Health Care and Surveillance in Haiti

description.narrative: The PDO of the proposed Project is to: (i) increase utilization of primary health care services in selected geographical areas; (ii) strengthen surveillance capacity especially for cholera, and (iii) provide an immediate and effective response to an eligible crisis or emergency.

condition.narrative: Schedule 2 Section IV. 2: No later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall develop and furnish to theAssociation the Community Health Strategy and Implementation Plan referred to in Part 1(b) of the Project, all in a manneracceptable to the Association.

Schedule 2 Section IV.1 No later than 1 month before the beginning of each fiscal year (FY), the Recipient shall prepare andfurnish an annual work plan (AWP) for that FY, satisfactory to the Association, including the activities to be carried out underthe Project during said FY with their respective sources of funding. Said AWP may be modified during the FY with prior approval ofthe Association

Schedule 2 Section IV.1: No later than one month before the beginning of each FY, the Recipient shall prepare and furnish an AWPfor that FY, satisfactory to the WB, including the activities to be carried under the Project during said FY with their respectivesources of funding. Said AWP may be modified from time to time during the FY, with prior approval of the WB.

Schedule 2 Section IV.2: No later than six (6) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall develop and furnish to theWorld Bank (WB) the Community Health Strategy and Implementation Plan referred to in Part 1(b) of the Project, all in a manneracceptable to the WB.
